response.overview: In a dystopian future, Dredd, the most famous judge (a cop with instant field judiciary powers) is convicted for a crime he did not commit while his murderous counterpart escapes.
response.tagline: In the future, one man is the law.
response.title: Judge Dredd

titles.title: จัดจ์ เดรดด์ ฅนหน้ากาก 2115
